name: Silk (itch)
description:
Try your best as you carry a lone silk egg out of a dangerous cavern of monsters. Be carful though! The egg an crack and will eventually break! The monsters want the egg, not you, so keep that in mind when maneuvering around the cramped corridors of the cave!

Controls:  W,A,S,D, arrow keys, or left joystick to move around

There is one minor bug with the end cutscene, certain particles don't show up, Ill fix this after the jam at some point
